thread.title: Simone Biles totally upstaged the Rockets' mascot in impromptu dance-off
thread.title_full: Simone Biles totally upstaged the Rockets' mascot in impromptu dance-off

author: Molly Podlesny
title: Simone Biles totally upstaged the Rockets' mascot in impromptu dance-off
text:
WORK.
Olympic gymnast Simone Biles attended the Rockets-Jazz game Wednesday night. 
As if we didn’t already know from her amazing floor routine, she showed us once again her great dance moves.
Simone Biles, the Olympic champion.

Simone Biles, the #NBA fan. pic.twitter.com/wEmE6UHoOY 
— NBA (@NBA) March 9, 2017 She did the cat daddy with Clutch, the Rockets mascot, and she did it better than he did. Granted, Clutch was in a large bear suit, but Biles was wearing some pretty tall shoes.
This is just something we love to see, athletes as fans. It’s especially great when someone shows up at an event outside the sport with which we normally associate them, like seeing your teacher in the grocery store as a kid. Or seeing Guy Fieri at the NBA All Star Weekend. 
It may feel weird, but it’s sure as hell fun.
